adviseScripts.text: Partner!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I've been getting a lot of complaints at the office about my bike being too loud.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I should do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Give a heartfelt apology.
Give them a swift kick in the rear.
I'll think about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I was thinking the exact same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Good answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I spend time talking about her bike.
Milk says she would rather gargle bleach than drink coffee with sugar.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: What can you even say to such a flagrant insult?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Give her some bleach.
Keep things cordial with your squadmates.
Genius!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I knew you'd have my back, Partner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I'll stop by Yan's store on the way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You want me to just... ignore her?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Well, I guess that could be a solution.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I have a relaxing tea time together.
I've told you how Black Typhoon is a real gas-guzzler, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Any ideas?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Do you feel that the fuel you put into Black Typhoon is a waste?
Change to cheaper fuel.
Nah. Not at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: ... Thanks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I'm not gonna shorten her life span.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: But thanks for trying, Partner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Sugar brag about Black Typhoon for a long time.
I am working on a new sugar coffee recipe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: How many scoops of sugar do you think is best?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: 10 spoonfuls.
11 spoonfuls.
Nah, not enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You wouldn't even be able to taste the sweetness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, that should just about do it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Just enough to start tasting the sweetness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I talk about coffee.
You know Milk and Frima?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: They're a real pain in my neck. All they do is stand around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you just stand around, then? Someone else will do the work eventually.
Give them a kick in the pants.
Hey, not bad, Partner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I'll beat them at their own game!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I already tried that, but it didn't do any good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I should try running them over with Black Typhoon...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I have a discussion about the proper way to slack off.
Sometimes Milk and Frima like to talk about music.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: What kind of music do you think suits my vibe?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Hard-hitting heavy metal.
Graceful classical music.
Huh. You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I guess that's the easy answer considering how I look, but I'm a little disappointed to hear you say that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Whoa! Are you some kind of mind reader?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Musical taste has nothing to do with one's physical appearance, but a lot of people don't seem to know that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I discuss music with Sugar.
I run into all sorts of shady characters when I'm on the job.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: But I've got to maintain my reputation as a problem-solver, so I can't turn anybody down. What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Image is important. Learn to be patient.
Keep taking every job, no matter how shady.
Patience... that's the one thing I'll never be good at.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Thanks anyway, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: It's like they say, "you've gotta walk a mile in someone else's shoes".
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: All right. Next time I'll go ahead and take the jobs regardless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I share our work-related grievances.
Vroom, vroom.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Vroom! Vroom, vroom!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Vroooooom!!
Honk, honk!
Vroom, vroom! Vroooooom!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Black Typhoon doesn't have a horn.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I spend time pretending to be motorcycles.
Once in a while, I go a bit overboard when I get caught up in the heat of battle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I'm a little worried that one day I might get myself into trouble.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You just do you. I'll heal you whenever you need it.
Cut loose if you want, just be sure to trust me and your other teammates.
Even if I might sustain some serious injuries?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I don't want to get myself hurt.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: ... Right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I am not fighting alone. Thanks for reminding me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I discuss what it's like on the battlefield.
Whenever I go for a ride inside the Ark, there're too many people. It's hard to pick up any speed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I want to redline it! How can I do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: How about adding another 0 to the speedometer?
Honk the horn.
So even if I'm only going 30, it'll show up as 300.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: That could really help lift my spirits. I'll try it out next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You want me to scare people?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I may be a speed demon, but I'm not rude.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I have an honest discussion about speed.
Black Typhoon has been making some strange noises lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I wonder what's wrong...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Let's inspect the engine.
Let's take it to the hospital.
Good idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: We can check if there are any other issues while we're at it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: The hospital?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Somehow I don't think that's the right place to bring it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I fret over what to do about Black Typhoon.
Every time I go up to the surface,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I feel this irresistible urge to go for a spin on my bike.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Let's do it.
Let's do it when we reclaim the surface.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: If we did that now, the Raptures would hear us and be on our tails in an instant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I don't want to throw my life away just because I've got a need for speed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Fine...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I can't wait for that day to come.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: When that time comes, you'll be there with me, right Partner?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I fantasize about burning rubber up on the surface.
I had a horrible nightmare.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Someone had put milk and cream into a Sugar Coffee.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: It certainly sounds horrible.
That actually sounds kind of good to me.
I know, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sullying a perfectly good sugar coffee with those filthy ingredients.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Gives me chills just thinking about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Everybody knows you only put sugar in a Sugar Coffee.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Don't joke around like that, this is no laughing matter!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Sugar about nightmares.
Hey, what do you think about Frima?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Do you think she has what it takes to be a leader?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: She's the de facto leader of Cafe Sweety.
I think she's a bit too apathetic for that.
You know a lot about Frima.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You don't understand Frima at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: It may seem like she's always dragging her feet,
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: but in reality, she's incredibly thorough. That way, she can prevent any irritating complications from cropping up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Cafe Sweety would be nothing without her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Sugar about Frima.
Milk was telling me how fun Would You Rather is, and was asking me all sorts of hypotheticals.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I didn't think it was very fun. All the options were too easy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Try and ask me a few questions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Would you rather only have Sugar Coffee, or Black Typhoon?
Would you rather only have Sugar Coffee, or me?
... I can't choose. I lose.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Again, too easy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Of course, it's you, Partner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: What could be more important than you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Is this the part where we kiss?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I play a bit more of Would You Rather.
Partner, do you have a habit that you can't tell anyone about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: When I'm alone I mimic how Black Typhoon sounds.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: *Vroom-m-m*
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: No.
When I'm alone I mimic Frima's voice.
... Are you sure?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You're not just saying that because you're embarrassed, are you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Be honest!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I guess there is a certain appeal
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: in trimming off all the fat when you're speaking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I'll try it out sometime.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I take turns imitating various sounds.
I brought some coffee on my way here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Which one would you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: They're both Sugar Coffees... just give me whichever.
Which one is the Sugar Coffee?
Nicely done!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: It wasn't really a test, but I'm glad to see that you could tell.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Here, have a drink.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Actually...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Both of them are Sugar Coffees.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd be able to tell.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Was it really that hard?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I sipped coffee as we had our discussion.
You wear a helmet whenever you ride a motorcycle, don't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Of course.
You don't wear one though, isn't that right?
Good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: It's okay for me not to since I'm a Nikke, but it's a must for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I'm a Nikke.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: This noggin of mine is tougher than any helmet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: But you're a human being. No matter how skilled a rider you are, you could always get into an accident.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Enjoying a nice ride is one thing, but safety comes first.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I talk about how to ride motorcycles safely.
How come there aren't any motorcycle races around here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I'd crush it, I just know it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: You should start one of your own.
It isn't popular enough.
I could name it whatever I want...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: This is so exciting!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: But how do I get started?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: I guess you're right...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: If it were more popular, they would have already set up a racing circuit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: What can I do to make more people aware of motorcycle racing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I fantasize about a motorcycle racing competition.
We hit record numbers this month with Sugar Coffee sales.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Do you know the reason?
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: That's because the population in the Outpost has increased.
That's because the taste of the Sugar Coffee has improved.
Hey, you're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: More Nikkes are living here than ever before.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: That's a load off my mind. Thanks, Partner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar Coffee's claim to fame is its perfect blend of various flavors.
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: The flavor hasn't changed at all...
adviseScripts.speaker: Sugar

adviseScripts.text: Sugar and I have a debate about coffee sales.
